about_the_game:
Welcome to Fox of the moon VR! We invite you to immerse yourself in a world of adventure and cleverness alongside our protagonist, a quick and agile fox. With Fox of the moon VR, you can explore a world full of dangers and discoveries as you use your skills to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. There are no limits to what you can do in this virtual reality game!


Features:
·High quality graphics and smooth animations that make you feel like you're truly in the world of Fox of the moon VR.
·Ride a fox and shoot magic from its back.
·A wide variety of environments and scenarios to explore, each with its own set of challenges and rewards.
·An engaging storyline and lovable characters that will keep you hooked on the game for hours.
·Collect lunar dew and improve your status. The game have a some RPG elements that we all love.
·New content and improvements will come periodically such as new open worlds and skills.

**Fox of the Moon is a game specifically developed for Oculus/Meta virtual reality devices. So if you want to play VR just put on your Meta VR headset and press play from the normal Steam library. **IMPORTANT** The game is NOT compatible with Steam VR right now. Only OpenXR to play in VR mode (Oculus/Meta quest link)**

You can also play the game with the non VR mode with the mouse & keyboard.



The world of Fox of the moon VR is full of wonders and dangers. There is a wide variety of environments and scenarios to explore, from dark forests and hidden caves to ancient cities and sacred temples. Each of these places holds its own surprises and challenges, and it is your mission to discover them all as you embark on an epic adventure.

name: Fox of the moon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i7 4790k or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Compatible with all Oculus/ Meta VR headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i9 9900k or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2070 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Compatible with all Oculus/Meta VR headset

short_description: Fox of the moon is a virtual reality game that will take you on an epic adventure riding Akami, a white fox with supernatural powers.
